title: About me

content:
sabby@blue:~$ mommy hugoHi! I’m Sabby!! I like to draw as a hobby. I also advocate for the open source software that I use daily. I’ve used variations of Linux full-time for about 5 years now- that’s a lot! My daily driver as of today is Fedora Workstation. I’m a long time GNOME fan. I like to use apps from Flathub when available. I use Krita to produce digital art (made by KDE). Please consider supporting these projects.
I’m looking to submit my drawings here, and maybe write some opinion pieces. Thanks for reading! Cheers!
PS: Special thanks to blahaj,land for hosting the site! And be sure to check out Zoey and the critter’s places as well! Cheers
summary: sabby@blue:~$ mommy hugoHi! I’m Sabby!! I like to draw as a hobby. I also advocate for the open source software that I use daily.
title: Sabbyblue
